documentation.author: Terry Wright
documentation.purpose: Rule triggers on clincial event with event class of "MED" and a PRN Reason exists. The order "Document Pain Medication Preassess" is placed.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_NORMALCY_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request for event set name of EVENT_SET_NAME and a event class of EVENT_CLASS with a result status RESULT_STATUS is NORMALCY

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_NORMALCY_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request for event set name of EVENT_SET_NAME and a event class of EVENT_CLASS with a result status RESULT_STATUS is NORMALCY

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST for any order(s) in LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_END_TIME_L
templateDefinitions.definition: a STATUS result exists for EVENT_SET_NAME that is OPT_EVALUATION, OPT_VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 with an event end time within OPT_TIME_NUM, OPT_TIME_UNIT, OPT_DIRECTION, OPT_LINK's event end time.
templateDefinitions.description: Numeric result value, status, event end time

statements.statement:
eks_codeset_cki_refhelp "8","CKI","*ANY_STATUS" go
/* select distinct Result_Status = if (t.seq = 1) cv.description else "*ANY_STATUS" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) cv.code_value else 0.0 endif from code_value cv, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan cv where cv.code_set = 8 and cv.active_ind = 1 and cv.cdf_meaning > " " join t order Result_Status */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_NEW
templateDefinitions.definition: Order PROCEDURE PRIORITY and bill code CODE with CHART order comment COMMENT

statements.statement: select ocs.mnemonic,catalog_type=cv.display from order_catalog oc, order_catalog_synonym ocs, code_value cv plan oc where oc.orderable_type_flag not in (2,3,6,8,11) and oc.active_ind = 1 and oc.catalog_type_cd > 0 join cv where cv.code_value = oc.catalog_type_cd and cv.cdf_meaning != "PHARMACY " join ocs where ocs.catalog_cd = oc.catalog_cd and ocs.mnemonic = oc.primary_mnemonic order cnvtupper(ocs.mnemonic)
SELECT C1.DISPLAY_KEY,C1.DESCRIPTION,C1.CODE_VALUE FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET = 2054 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND=1 ORDER C1.DISPLAY_KEY
SELECT C1.DESCRIPTION FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE CODE_SET = 13028 ORDER C1.CODE_VALUE

customValue.value: Primary Pain Numeric Intensity After Act

values.value: Primary Pain Numeric Intensity After Act

customValue.value: Primary Pain Numeric Intensity with Act

values.value: Primary Pain Numeric Intensity with Act
